assignment_title: I Want - Needs vs Wants Exercise
subject: social_emotional_learning

student_response.how_it_helps: it will help my tummy happy

positive_indicators: understands difference between needs and wants
can identify appropriate person to ask (mom)

conversation_starters: Great job understanding this is a want, not a need!
Let's talk about other things that make us happy
How can we make healthy choices for treats?
extension_activities: create family needs vs wants chart

teacher_notes: Student demonstrates strong SEL understanding and appropriate help-seeking behavior
